title: how do i put kanji in my summoner name?
body: i can't put kanji in my summoner name. FeelsBadMan it sucks. help me.

replies.body: Each region has their own character limits and [supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  Our list of [special characters ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ)for these reasons may help in deciding your summoner name.  I hope that helps!
